explanation: [0-0] A person wearing a white button-down shirt and black pants is using a red triangle ruler to mark a plank of wood. They are wearing a white button-down shirt and black pants, and holding a cutting tool in their right hand. The floor is grey concrete.

[4-10] Then the scene changes again. It's the corner of a room with orange floor and brown walls. There are two wooden boards, one above the other, close together on the ground. The upper board fits against the wall, and the lower rectangular board moves diagonally along the boundary and finds that it cannot fit against the wall. So he took a red triangle ruler and drew a straight line on the rectangular board. After separating a small triangular board from the rectangular board along the straight line, the rest fit perfectly against the wall.
